il.ac.hit.taxitogo.model.taxicompany

Interface ITaxiCompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLTaxiCompanyDAO

    public interface ITaxiCompanyDAO

    An Interface class for taxi car company DAO purpose.

    Version:
    22.01.2015
    Author:
    Victor Zhinzherov, Lior Kizer, Ariel Yusupov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTaxiCompany(TaxiCompany taxiCompanyToAdd)
      This method is used to add new taxi car company into the database.
      boolean deleteTaxiCompany(java.lang.String taxiCompanyName)
      This method is used to delete taxi car company from the database.
      TaxiCompany getTaxiCompany(java.lang.String taxiCompanyName)
      This method is used to get taxi car company from the database.
      java.util.Collection<TaxiCompany> getTaxiCompanys()
      This method is used to get taxi cars companies list from the database.
      boolean isCompanyExists(java.lang.String companyName)
      This method is used to check, if a certain taxi car company exist in the database.
      void updateTaxiCompany(TaxiCompany taxiCompanyToUpdate)
      This method is used to update taxi car company info in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • addTaxiCompany

        void addTaxiCompany(TaxiCompany taxiCompanyToAdd)
             throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to add new taxi car company into the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiCompanyToAdd - TaxiCompany - Taxi company object
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • getTaxiCompany

        TaxiCompany getTaxiCompany(java.lang.String taxiCompanyName)
                    throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to get taxi car company from the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiCompanyName - String - Taxi car company name
        Returns:
        TaxiCompany - Taxi car company object
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • getTaxiCompanys

        java.util.Collection<TaxiCompany> getTaxiCompanys()
                                           throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to get taxi cars companies list from the database.

        Returns:
        Collection - Taxi cars companies list
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • deleteTaxiCompany

        boolean deleteTaxiCompany(java.lang.String taxiCompanyName)
                   throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to delete taxi car company from the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiCompanyName - String - Taxi car company name
        Returns:
        boolean - True if taxi car company was deleted. False if taxi car company wasn't deleted.
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • updateTaxiCompany

        void updateTaxiCompany(TaxiCompany taxiCompanyToUpdate)
                throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to update taxi car company info in the database.

        Parameters:
        taxiCompanyToUpdate - TaxiCompany - Taxi car company object
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • isCompanyExists

        boolean isCompanyExists(java.lang.String companyName)
                 throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to check, if a certain taxi car company exist in the database.

        Parameters:
        companyName - String - Taxi car company name
        Returns:
        boolean True if taxi car company is exist. False if taxi car company doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database
